Mobile.Hawthorn House (Mobile, Alabama): The Hawthorn House is a historic house in Mobile, Alabama, United States. The ​1 1⁄2-story wood-frame structure, on a brick foundation, was built in 1853 in the Gulf Coast Cottage style by Joshua K. Hawthorn. It was placed on the National Register of Historic Places on May 21, 1984, based on its architectural significance.
